name: Caved (Champlain Game Academy 22)
description:
A great explorer has found an abandoned mine in the middle of the forest.  This explorer has only briefly visited this mine because of the rumor of a mysterious monsters that live within. Your objective is to collect the riches and get out. Good Luck.

Controls:

WASD Movement

During the main game, Press ESC to pause game.

Click on riches until it disappears

Hold Shift to Sprint

Spacebar to Jump

Hold Left Ctrl to Crouch

This is also in the tutorial in the main menu.

Updates: 

In the future, there maybe a chance this game gets updated, but there is no guarantee.
